**Supply of a Gas Chromatograph/Autosampler**
=====================================================

**Reference Number:** cb-413-28872481

**Publication Date:** January 19, 2024

**Tender Closing Date:** February 29, 2024, 5:00 p.m.

**Notice:**
Environment and Climate Change Canada is soliciting a Gas Chromatograph/Autosampler through a selective tendering process under the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA).

**Prourement Method:**
The tendering process is open to pre-qualified suppliers who hold a Supply Arrangement (E60PV-19EQUI) with Public Works and Government Services Canada for the supply of Laboratory and Scientific Equipment, Parts and Accessories, Services and Supplies.

**Notice Requirements:**
This notice is published on the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) for a period of 40 calendar days to comply with the requirements of the Supply Arrangement.

**Tender Description:**
Environment and Climate Change Canada requires a Gas Chromatograph/Autosampler for their operations. Suppliers must meet the mandatory technical criteria and obtain the highest combined rating of Technical Merit and Price to be considered for contract award.

**Contracting Entity:**
Environment and Climate Change Canada is the contracting entity, with the mailing address at 351 boul. Saint-Joseph, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0H3.

**Contact Information:**
To receive further information or submit a solicitation, please contact Shawn Davis at shawn.davis@ec.gc.ca or (873) 500-0215.

**Trade Agreements:**
This procurement falls under the CFTA and the CKFTA.

**Procurement Category:**
This procurement is classified under the Government of Canada's procurement category for Goods and Services.

**Comprehensive Land Claim Agreement:**
No Comprehensive Land Claim Agreement applies to this procurement.
